meanings.definition: A former monetary unit of Germany.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in Germany used duits to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I found an old collection of duits in my grandfather's attic.
meanings.sent3: The museum had a display of duits from different eras.
meanings.sent4: His love for collecting duits was as strong as his passion for history.
meanings.sent5: The shiny duits sparkled under the museum lights.

meanings.sent1: I received a duits as change when I bought some candy.
meanings.sent2: The duits had a windmill design on one side.
meanings.sent3: The duits in my piggy bank jingled happily.
meanings.sent4: She tossed the duits into the fountain, making a wish.
meanings.sent5: The duits clinked together in his pocket as he walked.
